name: Family Ludo Fun
description: Family Ludo Fun game is board game played between friends, family & kids. Also including 2, 3 or 4 player lodo board game. Ludo board, moveable counters, a throw-able die and a scoring facility. Everything you need to play ludo instructions on how to play. The last game is automatically saved for you to continue. Ludo play on with wooden board! Ludo Fun game includes four players red, blue, green, yellow. The objective of the King 2 Ludo game is pretty straightforward Two, three, or four may play.Whoever gets all four Kings to the end first is the winner. However, each move can only be made based on the number decided by casting a six-sided die and each token can only move out of their home by casting a six. Ludo is a huge game in many countries, but you have never seen a Ludo game like this one.It takes the Ludo classic game to a new level. We have brought the same excitement for all of you. Play with your family or friends and show them what it takes to be a champion. Come on roll the dice, score high and make your best move with Ludo.
